verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>; And the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> showeth <S%H5046>his<s%> <S%H4639>handiwork<s%>.
There is no <S%H562>speech<s%> nor <S%H1697>language<s%>; Their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is not <S%H8085>heard<s%>.

Their <S%H6957>line<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> through all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And their <S%H4405>words<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%>. In them hath he <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H8121>sun<s%>,
Which is as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> coming <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H2646>chamber<s%>, And <S%H7797>rejoiceth<s%> as a strong <S%H1368>man<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> his <S%H734>course<s%>.

His going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And his <S%H8622>circuit<s%> unto the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of <S%H5641>it<s%>; And there is nothing hid from the heat <S%H2535>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>, <S%H7725>restoring<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%>: The <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H539>sure<s%>, making <S%H2449>wise<s%> the <S%H6612>simple<s%>.

The <S%H6490>precepts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H3477>right<s%>, <S%H8055>rejoicing<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%>: The <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H1249>pure<s%>, <S%H215>enlightening<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H2889>clean<s%>, <S%H5975>enduring<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: The <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H571>true<s%>, and <S%H6663>righteous<s%> <S%H3162>altogether<s%>.

More to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> are they than <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H7227>yea<s%>, than much fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>; <S%H4966>Sweeter<s%> also than <S%H1706>honey<s%> and the droppings of the <S%H5317>honeycomb<s%>.
Moreover by them is thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2094>warned<s%>: In <S%H8104>keeping<s%> them there is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6118>reward<s%>.
Who can <S%H995>discern<s%> his <S%H7691>errors<s%>? <S%H5352>Clear<s%> thou me from hidden <S%H5641>faults<s%>.

Keep <S%H2820>back<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> also from <S%H2086>presumptuous<s%> <S%H4910>sins<s%>; Let them not have dominion over <S%H8552>me<s%>: Then shall I be upright, And I shall be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%>.

Let the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and the <S%H1902>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> Be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, my <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and my <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>.
